description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A fast-paced, addictive block-drop game.  Stack like-colored blobs together and watch them Coagulate to form a larger high-value blob. ...But don't get too caught-up building the biggest blobs:  make sure to keep some free space before the screen fills up!
description.short: A fast-paced, addictive block-drop game.  Stack like-colored blobs together and watch them Coagulate to form a larger high-value blob. ...But don't get too caught-up building the biggest blobs:  make sure to keep some free space before the screen fills up!
